name: PHProjectElement
desc: The superclass for all element objects.

items.name: class PHProjectAssetElement
items.desc: An element that represents a media asset within project section content.

items.name: class PHProjectTextElement
items.desc: An element that represents text within project section content.

items.name: class PHProjectJournalEntryElement
items.desc: An element that represents a journal entry within project section content.

items.name: class PHProjectMapElement
items.desc: An element that represents a map within project section content.

items.name: var weight: Double
items.desc: A value between 0 and 1 representing relative significance of the element in its section.

items.name: var placement: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangle defining where an element is placed in grid space coordinates.
